fullText: Matthew Broderick and Annaleigh Ashford make a delightful comedy team in A.R. Gurney's lightweight but charming play about a dog who disrupts a marriage.
dtliExcerpt: Matthew Broderick and Annaleigh Ashford make a delightful comedy team in A.R. Gurney's lightweight but charming play about a dog who disrupts a marriage.
